snippet: Former NFL player Aaron Hernandez has settled a lawsuit filed by a friend who says Hernandez shot him in the face....
lead_paragraph: Former NFL player Aaron Hernandez has settled a lawsuit filed by a friend who says Hernandez shot him in the face.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Settles Lawsuit With Friend Who Was Shot
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Settles Lawsuit With Friend Who Was Shot
